src:
嗆歐陽娜娜「BITCH」500億白富美起底　13歲混進EXO後台
01 Nov 2019, 03:20 by 朱晉緯
歐陽娜娜與陳凱歌導演之子陳飛宇熱戀，讓原本是她閨密的綦美合與她決裂，因為家產500億的耀萊集團董事長千金綦美合也看上陳飛宇，卻被歐陽娜娜早一步搶到手，綦美合在網路上攻擊歐陽娜娜並大罵「BITCH」。而關於綦美合本身的「黑歷史」也被挖出，不僅曾經和韓團EXO粉絲對立、傳出被王一傳否認的緋聞，以及在網路上販售山寨品等舉動。
綦美合曾在在貼文說道：「麻煩現在女生能都正常點別到處招花惹草還顧著妳朋友的男票行嘛真瘦不了」、「嘴上還尼瑪說幫忙臥槽真是噁心死我了」、「來到中國請不要用你那嗲嗲的聲音說話了謝謝」，甚至在最後還罵了「it will all come back to you BITCH」。所有線索都直指在罵歐陽娜娜。


綦美合在網路上疑似發言謾罵歐陽娜娜，並大嗆「BITCH」。（翻攝微博）



綦美合是富家千金，疑因歐陽娜娜的新戀情而開始與她不合。（翻攝微博）

而綦美合的爭議事件不只這一樁， 13歲時她因為「走後門」混進韓團EXO後台，站在EXO中間一起合照，照片曝光後引起極大爭議，她雖出面解釋想平息風波，但事後又被網友起底她和好友嘲諷EXO的粉絲是「農民」的對話，讓她在網路上的聲勢更加低落。綦美合還被挖出曾經與中國男星王一傳爆出戀情，雙方被發現互傳親密合照，但是男方最後否認，而讓這層關係蒙上一層迷霧。


綦美合遭起底，過去曾直闖韓團EXO的後台發合照引發爭議。（翻攝微博）



綦美合還與中國藝人王一傳傳出戀情，被發現互傳親密合照。（翻攝微博）

綦美合曾就讀英國的中央聖馬丁藝術與設計學院，不過她被發現在網路上直接販售盜版的山寨品，她事後解釋「太忙」而沒有時間設計，但許多網友都對這個說法不領情。
更新時間｜2019.11.01 03:34
text:
Ouyang Nana choke "BITCH" white Fu-mei 50 billion since the end of 13-year-old got into EXO background
01 Nov 2019, 03:20 by Zhu Jinwei
Ouyang Nana and Chen Kaiyu, the son of Chen Kaige’s director, are in love with her, and she is a close friend of her, because the chairman of the Yaolai Group, which owns 50 billion yuan, also looks at Chen Feiyu, but she was grabbed by Ouyang Nana. , Qi Ouyang Nana attack the United States together on the web and cursed "BITCH." The "black history" about the United States and the United States itself has also been dug up, not only against the Korean group EXO fans, the anecdote denied by Wang Yichuan, and the sale of cottage products on the Internet.
Yan Meihe once said in the post: "The trouble is that girls can usually go out and sneak around and look at the friend’s male ticket. It’s really thin," said Nima, saying that helping the lying trough is disgusting. death of me "," please do not come to China with your whine that voice speak Thank you "and even in the last scolded," it will all come back to you BITCH. " All the clues are directed at Ouyang Nana.


Qi Mei He spoke on the web suspected abuse Ouyang Nana, and large choke "BITCH." (turning microblogging)



綦美合 is a rich family, suspected to be inconsistent with her because of Ouyang Nana’s new love. (turning microblogging)

At the age of 13, she was mixed into the EXO backstage of the Korean group because of the "back door". She took a photo together in the middle of EXO. After the photo was exposed, it caused great controversy. Although she explained that she wanted to calm the storm, but afterwards It was also the bottom of the netizen. She and her friends taunted EXO fans as a "farmer" dialogue, which made her voice on the Internet even lower. Yan Meihe was also dug out of a relationship with the Chinese male star Wang Yichuan. The two sides were found to have a close photo, but the man finally denied it and made this relationship a fog.


The United States and the United States have been bottomed up. In the past, the background photo of the Korean group EXO was directly controversial. (turning microblogging)



Yan Meihe also sent a love affair with Chinese artist Wang Yichuan and was found to have a close photo. (turning microblogging)

Ms. Mei has studied at the Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design in the UK, but she was found to be selling pirated copycats directly on the Internet. She explained “too busy” and did not have time to design, but many netizens did not appreciate this statement. .
Update time|2019.11.01 03:34
